website_summaries.verdict: Designed primarily for law enforcement professionals, and includes a number of features civilian models do not.
pros: Immediate back-up shot available, no reloading needed
Also works as a close-contact stun gun
Runs self-diagnostic tests and measures battery power
cons: Professional grade price point, but the performance may not be better overall than civilian models

customer_reviews.title: Bad taser
customer_reviews.text: Taser had a bad display unit and sports Lilly is horrible. The product could have been beneficial but the fact amazon allows sellers like sports Lilly sell on their platform is pathetic
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Personal Safty
customer_reviews.text: This tazer is an addition to my single shot tazer . Now I can keep one in my car . And one on my belt . Nothing is more important than personal and family safty in a violent world . And not using deadly force where not necessary . A lot cheaper than lawyer !
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: unable to choose left handed or right handed holster
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, I just wish the seller would have given me the option of a left hand holster. I contacted the seller via email and was told that I would be receiving a left hand holster but to this day and I never received it. Nevertheless, I really like the Taser X2 it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PERSONAL PROTECTION TOOL WITH A PROVEN TRACK RECORD. ALSO AT A GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO CARRY OR CONCEAL FOR PERSONAL PROTECTION OR THE PROTECTION OF OTHER/S WHO MAY NOT BE CAPABLE OF DEFENDING THEMSELVES. A VERY EFFECTIVE NON-LETHAL FORM OF DEFENSE.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Sweet odens raven its like having a lightning bolt on ur rig
customer_reviews.text: Now this thing is gangster .. immediately makes whoever you deal with think twice ... the look the feel the sound of the warning arc. If u are a security guard/ operator/ anyone else that does high risk work. I most certainly advise this tool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: All around great, it's pretty much everything I imagined it would be. However if you plan on using the holster it comes with on a duty belt be aware that it does ride fairly high
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great for self-defense, security ect. , price wise not the best , I’m a lefty and they don’t give the option of left or right side holster but overall it’s worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cheese

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: X2 is the best and for this price you cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ford

customer_reviews.title: Loved it well I had it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this device. The X2 is a lightweight device that can stop most people. Once I have the actual money instead of using a Credit Card, I WILL definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: kland707

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: It definitely got the job done. My brother and I were camping and a bear started to chase us. I pulled out the tazer and shot my brother so I got away nicely. Can't say as much for my brother tho.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but at what price?
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these as a gift and although it works as advertised, it in no way out performs my Taser Bolt, minus the ability to stun multiple assailants. Both do the same job in my experience. The prices of these tasers are getting out of hand! I guess they know fanatics will pay the price but still, just because you can make that much money off of something doesn't mean that you should. I'd rather support a business that's fair with product and pricing.
customer_reviews.author: D.Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great visual deterrent!
customer_reviews.text: I work as an armed security guard here in Kommiefornia aka California. I have worked in this field for a while. I tell all the younger guards that you should carry a less then lethal as an alternative to your gun.. I went all the way and got me one of these. It's a great visual deterrent. I have spoken to a couple of non-law abiding gentlemen and they have told me they rather get shot by a gun then hit by a taser. "You don't look so cool on world star crapping in my pants or peeing on myself" Lets just say they were very compliant. The weight of it is front heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ka Ja Sh!

customer_reviews.title: Great for protection
customer_reviews.text: My friend Ice got one of these and tazered a homeless man that was trying to beat him up. Cx
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Carry one every day for work. Great product, definitely does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Glotfelty

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Which type of weapon should I use? The knife, baton or tazor. That's right. The tazor. One look at this bad boy and whooo wheee.. Guy runs faster than a jumping kangaroo in the fourth of July. My point is this is a nasty mean looking weapon. Not for your average joe. Stay safe and keep tazing if you get crazy...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Segura

product_meta.title: TASER X2 Professional Series
product_meta.description:
TASER X2 is a revolution for shooting stun guns with two cartridges that can be controlled independently for police standards. 

The new dual laser sight and LED flashlight accurately display where each probe in a cartridge will be launched - removing any guesswork from firing. The TASER X2 contains a Central Information Display (CID) that communicates with its user of its power level, cartridge type and status, and will self-diagnosis itself to alert you if any problems arise. 

A warning electrical arc can be displayed while cartridges are loaded to deter culprits from escalating a conflict, and when probes are launched the Pulse Calibration System delivers the precise amount of electrical charge needed for incapacitation by recalibrating almost 20 times every second to self-adjust. This ensures the full amount of electricity is connecting with the assailant and not being interrupted by clothing, which can reduce its effectiveness. This new technology is 40% safer than previous conducted electronic weapon technology. 

The Performance Power Magazine (PPM) also provides improved power consumption and can allow up to 500 firings and the IPX2 weather resistance design adds the finishing touches to the X2, allowing it to have the highest performance than any other previous design. 

Technical data:


 *  IMMOBILIZATION CYCLE: 5 Seconds 
 *  Range: 15 ft. (4.6m) range 
 *  Dimensions w/ PPM: 7.8" L x 1.7" W x 4.2" H 
 *  Weight w/o PPM and 2 cartridges: 0.6 lbs 
 *  Operating/Storing temperature range: –4 °F [–20 °C] to 122 °F [50 °C]

Blackhawk holster –ensures comfortable and secure carrying, this Kydex holster is the same one trusted by law enforcement
feature_bullets: Neuro-Muscular Incapacitation (NMI) limiting muscular control for 5 seconds
15-Foot safety range gives you ample space to make a safe escape ; Legal to Own, Legal to Carry–no license needed in most states
Immediate Back-Up shot - no need to re-load. Contains conductive practice target
Class 3a laser targeting paired with a powerful LED Flashlight, targets are hard to miss
Contact stun for added insurance in those close Encounters; the only TASER device that can Engage contact stun while loaded and without firing
